Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Uyezve hauna mhosva neguta iri (Wakasununguka muGuta iri)
Asi haana kumboedza kupfuura nenzira yakatevenuka (yakareruka)
Uye chii chichakuita kuti uzive kuti nzira yakatevenuka chii
Kana kune murombo akarara muvhu (nokuda kweurombo)
Uye akazove umwe weavo vanotenda (muIslaam), uye vakakomekedzana kutsungirira, uye vakakomekedzana kunzwira tsitsi
Asi avo vasina kutenda muzviratidzo zvedu, ndeavo veruoko rweruboshwe (vanhu vekumoto)
Vachave vanovharirwa nemoto (Moto uchavakomberedza kubva kumativi ese)
Uye vakamuratidza zvakaipa kwaari nezvakanaka kwaari
Uye zvirokwazvo anokundikana uyo anozvikanganisira pachake (anoramba Islaam)
(Vanhu) veThamud vakaramba kuburikidza nekudarikidza kwavo mitemo (vairamba chitendero chechokwadi, Islaam, uye vachiita mabasa akaipa)
Apo muipi wavo akaenda mberi (kuti auraye ngamera)
Asi mutumwa waAllah (Swaalih (AS)) akati kwavari: “Iyi ingamera yaAllah (musaikuvadze), uye (musairambidze) kunwa kwayo!”
Naizvozvo vakamuramba uye vakaiuraya. Naizvozvo Tenzi vavo vakavaparadza nekuda kwechitadzo chavo, uye vakavaenzanisa mukuparadzwa (vanhu vose, vapfumi, nevarombo, vane simba nevasina simba)
Uye ivo (Allah) havana kutya zvichaitika mumashure mazvo
Zvirokwazvo, simba nemabasa enyu akasiyana siyana
Kune uyo anopa (zvipo) uye achitya Allah
Uye achitenda mune zvakanaka (Laa ilaaha illallaah – Hakuna ane kodzero yokunamatwa kunze kwaAllah; kana kuti mubairo kubva kuna Allah)
Asi uyo asingapi (anonyima), uye achifunga kuti mupfumi (haana chaanoda kubva kune umwe munhu)
Uye achiramba Al-Husna (zvakanaka: Laa ilaaha illallaah, kana kuti mubairo kubva kunaAllah)
Uye hupfumi hwake huchamubatsira chii paachawira pasi (mumatambudziko)
Uye zvirokwazvo kwatiri ndiko kune magumo nemavambo (upenyu hwepano pasi neuchatevera)
Hapana achaupinda kunze kweavo vachange vasina mufaro
Uye Al-Muttaqoon (vatsvene, vanhu vanotya Allah) vachaiswa kure nawo (moto weGehena)
Uye anopa hupfumi hwake kuti azvichenese
Uye uyo asiri kuripa chakanaka chaakaitirwa naani zvake
Kunze kwekuti achitsvaga chiso (kufadza) chaTenzi vake vepamusoro-soro
Uye zvirokwazvo mushure maizvozvo, achava anofara (paachapinda Paradhiso)
Tenzi vako (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)) havana kukurasirira kana kukuvenga
Uye zvirokwazvo hupenyu hwemangwana hwakanaka kwauri kukunda hupenyu hwenyika ino
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vachakupa (zvakanaka) naizvozvo ugofara
Havana here kukuwana (Muhammad (SAW)) uri nherera ndokubva vakuchengetedza
Uye vakakuwana uri murombo ndokubva vakuita mupfumi (mugutsikani nezvaunazvo)
Uyezve taura pamusoro pemakomborero aTenzi vako (awakapiwa, Huporofita nemamwewo)
